posts.message:
Nice Gist I made for using tmux.

If you don't know what tmux is:

tmux is a software application that can be used to multiplex several virtual consoles, allowing a user to access multiple separate terminal sessions inside a single terminal window or remote terminal session. It is useful for dealing with multiple programs from a command line interface, and for separating programs from the Unix shell that started the program.

Position 1: Full Time / Part Time ASP.NET MVC 3 Developer
Job Description:
- Working on Martial Arts and Medical projects with the 97 Display Development team.
- Great Communication and English Skills (written and spoken)
- Team based environment

Required Experience:
- At least 3 years in ASP.net MVC
- Good Knowledge of Entity Framework
- JQuery / HTML
- Solid Understanding of SQL
- Microsoft Certified is a BIG Plus
